titles.title: National Earthquake Hazards Reduction Program Reauthorization Act of 2025
National Earthquake Hazards Reduction Program Reauthorization Act of 2025
A bill to authorize the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
